Invoice Quick

• A single-file HTML web app for small business owners to generate and manage simple invoices without external dependencies.

• Core Features:
  - Create invoices with client name, invoice number, date, line items (description, quantity, unit price), and optional notes.
  - Auto-calculate subtotal, tax (configurable percentage), and total.
  - Display formatted invoice preview with professional layout.
  - Export invoice as PDF (using browser print-to-PDF) or copy invoice text to clipboard.
  - Save invoices to browser localStorage with searchable list view.
  - Delete or duplicate saved invoices.
  - Auto-generate next invoice number based on saved invoices.

• Keyboard Support:
  - Tab navigation through all form fields.
  - Enter to add line item; Delete key to remove selected line item.
  - Ctrl+S to save invoice; Ctrl+P to print/export.
  - Arrow keys to navigate invoice list.

• UI & Persistence:
  - Dark/light theme toggle that auto-detects system preference on first load; user choice persists in localStorage.
  - All invoices stored as JSON in localStorage; no server required.
  - Responsive single-column layout for mobile and desktop.
  - Clean, minimal design with clear visual hierarchy.

• Technical Requirements:
  - Single HTML file with inline CSS (grid/flexbox layout) and vanilla JavaScript.
  - No external libraries or CDNs.
  - Standard browser APIs only (localStorage, print API, clipboard API).
  - Works offline; all data client-side.
